sentence.Network_en: Accentual poetry is based on the number of stresses in a line.
sentence.Network_cn: 根据重音定节奏的诗是建立在每行诗重音数量基础之上的.

sentence.Network_en: Stressed or accented. Used of a syllable in accentual prosody.
sentence.Network_cn: 用于元音或音节;弱重音或无重音的.

sentence.Network_en: Forming an accentual unit with the following word and thus having no independent accent.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个词的重音落在最后一个音节上.
